sandbox.title: Experimental Sandbox
sandbox.description: A digital workbench for testing hypotheses. Exploring the intersection of design engineering and machine intelligence.
sandbox.disclaimer: This space contains unfinished experiments, technical notes, and prototypes built to explore ideas — not production-ready projects.

items.title: XENIA — AI Study Suite
items.summary: Evolution of an AI study planner into a modular AI study suite. Focus on orchestration of learning tools, scheduling intelligence, and adaptive feedback loops.

items.title: Website Change Intelligence
items.summary: Monitoring system for detecting meaningful changes across web pages. Emphasis on signal filtering rather than raw diffing.

items.title: Book Review Platform
items.summary: A structured book review application emphasizing insight extraction and long-term knowledge recall.

items.title: Research Workflow Tracker
items.summary: Tooling concepts for tracking research progress, hypotheses, dead ends, and literature dependencies.

items.title: AI Notes & Schedule from PDFs
items.summary: Exploration of extracting structured notes and time tables from academic PDFs using document intelligence.

items.title: Expense Insights from Documents
items.summary: High-level exploration of deriving expense summaries from semi-structured financial documents.

items.title: Patent Keyword Discovery
items.summary: Keyword-based exploration of patent databases to surface thematic trends and innovation clusters.

items.title: Electrician Assistant App
items.summary: Utility app concepts aimed at assisting field electricians with references, checks, and workflows.

items.title: Gas Leakage Detection (Vision)
items.summary: Early investigation into visual cues and anomaly detection for safety monitoring scenarios.

items.title: Financial Loss Pattern Analyzer
items.summary: Pattern-oriented analysis of financial data to identify recurring loss behaviors.

items.title: Sports Equipment Rental Platform
items.summary: Marketplace concept for short-term sports equipment rentals with inventory intelligence.

items.title: Stock Trend Exploration
items.summary: Exploratory work on identifying structural trends in market data using statistical learning.

items.title: Custom Customer Support Engine
items.summary: Design exploration for customizable customer support workflows powered by automation.

items.title: Candle Fire Simulation
items.summary: Physics-inspired simulation exploring flame dynamics at small scales.

items.title: Tidal Flooding Prediction
items.summary: Conceptual exploration of environmental data for understanding coastal flooding patterns.

items.title: Emotion Analysis App
items.summary: Exploration of affect recognition from multimodal signals with ethical constraints.

items.title: Guitar Tabs & Chords AI
items.summary: Conceptual tooling for translating musical structures into playable guitar representations.

items.title: AI Mental Health Assistant
items.summary: Ethics-first exploration of conversational systems for mental health support.

items.title: EMS Import Substitution Analysis
items.summary: Analytical study of imported electronics components to identify local manufacturing opportunities.

items.title: Environmental Monitoring Concepts
items.summary: High-level concepts for monitoring environmental anomalies using public data sources.

items.title: Audio Pattern Curiosity Project
items.summary: Lightweight audio pattern detection experiment built purely for curiosity and signal processing practice.

items.title: Dataset Visualization Tool
items.summary: Interactive visualization of uploaded datasets to support exploratory data analysis.
